module.name: RSS Ticker
module.author: Core
module.description: Display articles from an RSS feed

property.title: Update Interval Images (mins)
property.helpText: Please enter the update interval for images in minutes. This should be kept as high as possible. For example, if the data will only change once per hour this could be set to 60.

property.title: Feed URL
property.helpText: The Link for the RSS feed

property.title: Number of Items
property.helpText: The Number of RSS items you want to display

property.title: Take items from the
property.helpText: Take the items from the beginning or the end of the list

property.title: Reverse Order
property.helpText: Should we reverse the order of the feed items?

property.title: Randomise
property.helpText: Should the order of the feed be randomised? When enabled each time the Widget is shown the items will be randomly shuffled and displayed in a random order.

property.title: Show items side by side?
property.helpText: Should items be shown side by side?

property.title: Copyright
property.helpText: Copyright information to display as the last item in this feed.

property.title: Allowable Attributes
property.helpText: A comma separated list of attributes that should not be stripped from the incoming feed.

property.title: Strip Tags
property.helpText: A comma separated list of HTML tags that should be stripped from the feed in addition to the default ones.

property.title: Decode HTML
property.helpText: Should we decode the HTML entities in this feed before parsing it?

property.title: Disable Date Sort
property.helpText: Should the date sort applied to the feed be disabled?
